CartCheckoutSession.name: CartCheckoutSession
CartCheckoutSession.description: Represents a checkout session used in Lightning B2B Commerce checkout.

BackgroundOperationId.description: The ID of the in progress background operation.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency used for the checkout session. Default value is USD.

IsArchived.description: Indicates whether checkout processing is archived (true) or not (false). After a session is archived, it canâ€™t be unarchived. Default value is false.

IsError.description: Indicates whether the session is in error state (true) or not (false). Default value is false.

IsProcessing.description: Determines whether checkout processing is in progress (true) or not (false). Default value is false.

Name.description: The name of the checkout session.

NextState.description: The next state of the checkout session.

OrderId.description: The ID of a created order after the checkout session has gone from cart to order.

OrderReferenceNumber.description: Unique reference number the shopper can use to refer to the order. In API version 63.0 and later, LWR stores don't populate this field upon checkout. Instead, the InitialOrderReferenceNumber field on the WebCart object is populated.

State.description: The current state of the checkout session.

WebCartId.description: The ID of the cart that is used to create the checkout session.
